raw_text: For instance, incorporating WSD predictions into an MT decoder based on inversion transduction grammars (Wu, 1997)? such as the Bracketing ITG based models of Wu (1996), Zens et al (2004), or Cherry and Lin (2007)? would present an intriguing comparison with the present work
